title: Bioterrorism: Psychological and Public Health Interventions. Edited by R. J. Ursano, A. E. Norwood and C. S. Fullerton. (Pp. 363 and two compact discs; Price £70.00, ISBN 0-521-81472-3 hb.) Cambridge University Press: Cambridge, UK. 2004.
